name: Broken Chains Demo
description: There will be new updates in the future with a better story, new charters , and new gameplay mechanics. This game is being worked on by 2 people so it does take  a while for updates to come out so and if you see any bugs we will fix them or any errors. The characters will be changed in a few months I have someone drawing them for me which that person is the second person working on the game with me and right now we are looking for someone to help us with the music. This is a non profit project.
